comment.body: At least the peer list is still growing, that's still a plus.
Click on your name and just hover over the sections (your name, the circular profile picture, description). You should see little icons to edit/upload a picture.
You're very welcome, I'm glad I could help ^^, also your blog doesn't let me connect =(
Well this was definitely an interesting read
@CronianIce: Not sure, their were 6 peers when I was trying to connect at the time. But it took a bit, I was able to see it.

@ks: No, this was the first I've seen it. And honestly it just seems kind of silly since they're no way to gauge the impact if a 'blackout' were to happen on the tor network. But it did introduce me to ghostbin =D, so it was a plus for me either way.
Man it's been ages since I heard about someone that still went on Second life. Yeah some companies can ban via mac (if it was IP you could change that pretty easily).
yeah I just saw this and my first thought was he's gonna ruin everything, not just the US
